name: beartest-vscode
description: VSCode Test Explorer integration for beartest-js

pattern.description: Glob pattern to match test file paths (e.g., '**/*.test.*', 'packages/frontend/**/*.test.ts')

runtimeArgs.description: Additional arguments passed to the runtime before the test script

cwd.description: Optional working directory override (relative to workspace root)

beartest.configurations.description: Test configurations that define both which files to discover and how to run them. Each configuration matches files by pattern and specifies the runtime to use.
